    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int choice
      Choice for Threshold Initialization: 0 is for 0.0, 1 is for random verifications and 2 for suggested method.

      For δ-Initialization: δ To use for Candidate Generation

      For δ-Initialization: Number of verifications to perform.

    • Field Detail

      • method

        public java.lang.String method
        Name of setting for logs.

      • choice

        public int choice
        Choice for Threshold Initialization: 0 is for 0.0, 1 is for random verifications and 2 for suggested method.

      • mu

        public double mu
        For δ-Initialization: Number of candidates to refine per record. (μ * k)

      • lambda

        public int lambda
        For δ-Initialization: Number of verifications to perform. (λ * k)

      • deltaGeneration

        public double deltaGeneration
        For δ-Initialization: δ To use for Candidate Generation

      • samplePercentage

        public double samplePercentage
        For δ-Initialization: Use percentage of collection as query records.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TopkCompetitor

        public TopkCompetitor​(java.lang.String method,
                      int choice,
                      double deltaGeneration,
                      double mu,
                      int lambda,
                      double samplePercentage)
        Parameters:
        method - : Name of setting for logs.
        choice - : Choice for Threshold Initialization: 0 is for 0.0, 1 is for random verifications and 2 for suggested method.
        deltaGeneration - : For δ-Initialization: δ To use for Candidate Generation
        mu - : For δ-Initialization: Top-μ*k to keep from each record
        lambda - : For δ-Initialization: Top-λ*k to keep from all records
        samplePercentage - : For δ-Initialization: Use percentage of collection as query records.
